price: ហើយពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានបញ្ជូនមូសាជាមួយនឹង អាយ៉ាត់ៗរបស់យើងនិងភស្ដុតាងដ៏ច្បាស់លាស់។
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
